article_title: R.I.'s Coastal Medical gets national recognition for new care model
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: Rhode Island's largest group of primary care doctors has enjoyed so much success embracing a new model of care — one that is being touted by experts as a way to help cure the ills of America's health system — that it's now ranked among the best in the nation.On Friday, Coastal Medical announced that its new approach — getting paid by insurers for how effectively it cares for its patients, not simply by billing for doctor's visits and procedures — resulted in $15.3
article_metadata.author: Richard Salit
